revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AGPtek |model=SoundMate WM201 |asin=B00SKW4664;GB; |is_manuf=No |type=audio streamer, media streamer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=Micro USB |cpu1_brand=Actions Micro |cpu1_model=AM8253 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0E |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Axeme |ram1_model=H2A35121656BB6C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot, |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pad header |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188ETV |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |flags=SPDIF out, 3.5mm audio output, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=SoundMate-XXXXXX |default_pass=00000000 }} {{TagLine|SoundMate WiFi Music Streamer}} :[http://www.ezmusic.cn/product/ Product page]
===Specifications=== Hardware specification: *CPU: [[Actions Micro]] AM8253 :Built-in DAC: 24-bit (96KHz) *Flash: 128MB; RAM: 64MB (DDR3) *Wi-Fi: Realtek RTL8188 802.11b/g/n :Encryption: WPA, WPA2, WPA2 Mixed *Interface: TF Slot: 1x TF Card (up to 32GB) :USB: 1x USB 2.0 (file download and music play) :SPDIF: Optical audio interface, PCM 2.1/5.1 DD :3.5mm Earphone: Stereo audio interface *Audio Format: MP3,AAC,WAV,APE,WMA,DTS,AC3,m4a :Streaming Protocol: DLNA, AirPlay, QPlay *Audio Out: Optical & Analog audio :Audio SNR: 92db *Power supply: DC 5V 500mA with Micro USB *Button: Reset system; LED: Power & Wi-FI Status
===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2014/12/15/uyesee-wm201-wi-fi-music-streamer-features-actions-semi-am8253-soc/ ''SoundMate WM201'' on '''CNX-Software'''] :*SoC: [[Actions Semi]] AM8253 @600MHz ::(32-bit RISC), built-in 24-bit 96KHz DAC :*Storage: 128MB (for firmware), ::and micro SD card (for audio files) :*System Memory: 64MB (DDR3)
